Information Technology "Chinese Encoding Character Set"
1. This document defines the hexadecimal representation of Chinese graphics and characters and their binary codes for use in information technology.
This standard applies to the processing, exchange, storage, transmission, display, input and output of Chinese and other text, graphics, and character information.

This standard applies to technical products that have the function of information processing and exchange of Chinese and other text graphics characters, including but not limited to software products such as input methods, optical character recognition (OCR), editing and proofreading, machine translation, speech synthesis, text conversion, and braille writing, as well as portable products such as computers, communication terminals, electronic books, and learning machines.
2. References to the file.
The provisions contained in the following documents are incorporated by reference into this Agreement.

Among them, the cited document with a date refers only to the version of that date; the cited document without a date, the latest version (including all modification records) is applicable to this document.
GB2312-1980 "Information Exchange Using Chinese Character Encoding Character Set" Basic Set
GB11383-1989 Information Processing "Information Exchange Using Eight-bit Codes and Encoding Rules"
GB13000 Information Technology -- Universal Multibyte Character Set (UCS)
3. Terms and Definitions
The following terms and definitions apply to this document .
3.1. Character character
a set of elements that can be used by an organization, controlled by an organization, or used to represent data.
3.2. Coded character
character (3.1) and its encoding.
3.3 User-defined private use area
users of the product covered by this document may define their own areas.
3.4. Repertoire
a set of characters (3.1) represented by a set of encoded characters (3.2) .
3.5. reserved zone
the remaining area is reserved for future use as defined in this document .
four words
4.1. Overview
The characters in this document are encoded as single bytes , double bytes , or quad bytes .
The single-byte part contains all 128 characters of GB11383-1989 0x00~0x7F.
4.3. Double-byte part
The two-byte part contains all the graphical characters in GB2312-1980 and the CJK unified characters in GB13000, as well as some graphical characters.
the characters in the two-byte part are specified in Appendix A.
Among them, the graphical, coding, and functional representation of semantic text descriptors shall conform to the provisions of Appendix B.
Note: GB13000 is a unified encoding of Chinese characters used in China, Japan, Korea, Vietnam, etc.
Assign unique code positions to Chinese characters with unique abstract forms, and assign shared code positions to Chinese characters with abstract forms that are the same but have different origins.
The encoded Chinese characters are called CJK Unified Ideographs, where CJK stands for China, Japan, and Korea.
4.4. Four-byte part

The four-byte part contains 66 CJK Unified Han characters (9FA6, 9FEF; not including 9FB4~9FBB’s 8 characters), CJK Unified Han character extension A, CJK Unified Han character extension BCJK Unified Han character extension C, CJK Unified Han character extension DCJK Unified Han character extension F, and some of the minority characters that have already been encoded in
the bytes of the four-character code are specified in Annex C.
5. Overall structure
In the text, any number preceded by 0x is in hexadecimal, and any number not preceded by 0x is in decimal.
All the encoded representations in the appendix are in hexadecimal, and all other numbers are in decimal.
The character code part adopts the encoding structure of GB11383-1989, and uses the code bits from 0x00 to 0x7F.
The double-byte character set uses two eight-bit bytes to represent a character. The first byte of the code is from 0x81 to 0xFE, and the last byte of the code is 0x40 to 0x7E and 0x80 to 0xFE.
The four-byte part uses GB11383-1989 as the suffix for extended double-byte encoding, with the encoding range being 0x81308130 to 0xFE39FE39.

The first character of a four-byte character is encoded in the range of 0x81 to 0xFE; the second character is encoded in the range of 0x30 to 0x39; the third character is encoded in the range of 0x81 to 0xFE; the fourth character is encoded in the range of 0x30 to 0x39. That is: 0x81308130

From 0x90308130 to 0xE339FE39, a total of 1058400 bits are used to map GB13000's 16 auxiliary planes, and the character arrangement order is completely arranged according to the corresponding bit order of GB13000's 16 auxiliary planes.

9.1. In general
This document defines three levels of implementation.
The system software product that meets the corresponding implementation level shall provide all the input/output functions of all characters within the corresponding implementation level range.
9.2 Level 1

Implement level 1 character encoding of the single character code part, the double season code part, and the four-character compound code part of the CJK Unified Character Set (i.e., 0x82358F33 to 0x82359636) and the CJK Unified Character Set Extended A (i.e., 0x8139EE39 to 0x8235
Any product to which this document applies shall meet the requirements of level 1.
Note: According to the software application requirements, level 1 can also choose any one or more of the non-Chinese writing styles listed in Table 3.
9.3 Level 2
level 2 includes level 1.
In addition, level 2 also encodes characters that are not included in the Unicode Hanzi table in level 1.
The code position and form of the characters collected in the Common Standard Hanzi Table are shown in the appendix.
The operating system and supporting software must meet the requirements of level 2.

Note: Software for systems and software for documents include but are not limited to operating systems, database management systems, and middleware (Classification information of software products see GB36475).
9.4 Level 3
level 3 includes level 2.
In addition, level 3 also includes all the Chinese characters and the Kangxi radicals specified in the original document and Table 3.
Products used for government services and public services should meet the requirements of level 3.

The C and C++ compilers are integrated. They all process input files using one or more of the four steps: preprocessing, compilation, assembly, and linking.
the source file suffix identifies the language of the source file , but the linker controls the default setting :
gcc thinks that the preprocessed file (.i) is a C file, and sets up a C-style link.
g++ considers the preprocessed file (.i) to be a C++ file and sets up the linkage in the C++ style.
the postfix indicates the language type and the later operation:
.c C source code; preprocessing, compilation, linking
.C C++ source code; preprocessing, compilation, linking
.cc C++ source code; preprocessing, compilation, linking
.CXX C++ source code; preprocessing, compilation, linking
.m Objective-C source code; preprocessing, compilation, linking
.i preprocessed c files; compile, link
.ii preprocessed c++ files; compile, link
.s  collects language source programs; collects
collect language source programs; preprocess, collect
.h preprocessor files; these are not usually present on the command line when other files are passed to the linker (Linker). They usually include:
.0 Object file
.a archive file
The linking step is always the last step unless the -cec, -s, or -E options (or a compilation error) prevent the full process.

During the linking phase, all files that correspond to the source program, .e files, unidentified library files, and files named .o H files and .a libraries are passed to the linker options (OPTIONS) in the order specified on the command line.
options must be given separately: de ' is not the same as -d -r '.
Most ` -=E :and`-W' options have two opposing formats : -fname and -fno-name (or -Wname and -Wno-name).
Only the non-default formats are listed here.

especially the content about the preprocessor , but not the other effects of the option -traditional .
-fdollars-in-identifiers allows the use of the `$' character in identifiers (only for C++).
you can specify the -Efno-dollars-in-identifiers option to make the use of the $ character explicit.
(GNU C++ allows the `$' character by default on some target systems, but not all.)
-fenum-int-equiv  allows implicit conversion from ant type to enumeration (enumeration) type (MEF c++) .
By default, GCC allows conversion from enum to int, but not the other way around.

-fexternal-—templates generates smaller code for template declarations (template declarations) in C++ by generating a copy of the template function for each template function only at the point of definition.
to use this option successfully, you must mark #pragma implementation or #pragma interface in all files that use the template with the appropriate definition or declaration.
The compiler compiles all template instantiations as external types. You must make the required instantiations appear in the implementation file.
This can be achieved by using typedef, which references each instance that is required.
Correspondingly, if the compiler option -fno-exteznal-templates is used at compile time, all template instances are explicitly set to be built-in.
all member functions ( except constructors and mnew or delete member operators ) are considered virtual functions of the class .
this does not mean that every call to a member function goes through the internal virtual function table.
In some cases, the compiler can determine that a virtual function can be called directly, and it does so.
-fcond-mismatch  allows the types of the second and third arguments of a condition expression to be mismatched.
The value of this expression is Void.-fthis-—is-variable allows the assignment of this (only in c++).
After merging the user-defined free store management mechanism into C++, the assignable `this' becomes inappropriate.
Therefore, by default, an assignment to this inside a member function is an invalid operation.
However, to be backward compatible, you can make this operation effective by using the -fthis-is-variable option.
-funsigned-char  defines char as an unsigned type, like unsigned char.
Each machine has its own default char type. It could be unsigned char or signed char.
In an ideal world, when relying on symbolic data, a portable program should always use signed char or unsigned char.
However, many programs have been written using only simple char, and they expect that this is a signed number (or an unsigned number, depending on the target machine).
this option and its opposite option make the program work on the corresponding default value.
The type of a char should always be explicitly defined as signed char or unsigned char, even if it is exactly the same as one of them.
if no explicit signed or unsigned modifier is present , these options define a signed or unsigned bitfield .
By default, bit fields are signed, because they inherit the basic integer types, such as int, which are signed, but if the -traditional option is specified, bit fields are always unsigned.
-fwritable-strings stores string constants in a writable data segment and does not make any special treatment.
This is for compatibility with some old programs, and the idea of treating a string constant as a character is a very bad one, and the -traditional option has the same effect.

The Impact of COVID-19 on the Illicit Drug Market
the impact could be similar to the 2008 financial crisis.
The global pandemic of COVID-19 has plunged the world into an unprecedented crisis.
In many countries, the disease has left health services stretched, near collapse, and measures taken by governments to contain it have caused havoc in the global economy.
The impact of the pandemic on the drug market is still unclear and difficult to predict, but it could be significant.
Some producers may be forced to find new ways to manufacture drugs as restrictions on mobility also limit access to precursors and basic chemicals.
Retailers may have to find new routes and methods to get their goods to customers as travel restrictions make it difficult to cross borders.
The patterns of drug use and distribution may change , and the government's ability to respond may be hampered .
The changes brought by the new coronavirus are unprecedented, but we can still learn some lessons from past crises.
After the 2008 economic crisis, some addicts began to look for cheaper synthetic substances and switched to injecting drugs.
At the same time, governments have cut budgets for drug-related programs.

if governments respond to the current economic downturn in the same way , interventions such as prevention of drug use and related risky behaviors , as well as substance abuse treatment services , may be severely affected .
in addition , priority may be given to interdiction and international cooperation , making it easier for traffickers to operate .
Some countries have large quantities of drugs smuggled through commercial flights, and these countries are expected to be the most directly affected by drug trafficking.
Messengers carry the drugs, often in large quantities, in their pockets or in their luggage.
While international mail supply chains have been disrupted, the use of the dark web and parcel delivery for sales may increase.
in the long term , economic recession and related measures may disrupt the drug market .

With rising unemployment and lack of opportunities, poverty and vulnerable populations are more likely to turn to drug abuse, addiction, and diseases, and to engage in illicit activities related to drug production and trafficking, whether as producers or transporters.
Drug trafficking organizations may exploit this situation by providing services to vulnerable populations and recruiting new members to bolster their ranks.
As government capacity declines, these changes may take root quickly and become a new reality for many communities.
extending and complexity
market growth
The population growth pattern explains part of the reason for market expansion
The number of drug addicts is increasing all over the world, whether it is from the overall number or from the proportion of drug addicts in the world population.

In 2009, the estimated number of drug addicts was 210 million, accounting for 4.8% of the global population aged 15-64, while in 2018, the estimated number of drug addicts was 269 million, accounting for 5.3% of this population.
in the past 20 years , the rate of increase in drug addiction in developing countries has been far greater than that in developed countries .

This reflects to some extent the different population growth rates overall - 7 percent in developed countries and 28 percent in developing countries - but also the faster growth of the young population in developing countries.
adolescents and young adults make up the largest proportion of drug users .
Between 2000 and 2018, the population of developing countries in this age group grew by 16 percent, while the population of developed countries in this age group shrank by 10 percent.
1. Urbanization is a driving force in the current and future drug market
regardless of whether it is a developed country or a developing country , the addiction situation in urban areas is more serious than that in rural areas .

The overall increase in drug addiction is partly due to the massive migration of people from rural areas to cities. Currently, more than half of the world's population lives in urban areas, compared to 34% in 1960.
Urbanization may be a key factor in the future dynamics of the drug market, especially in countries where urbanization is more pronounced.

the increase in wealth is associated with an increase in drug use , but the burden of disease is greatest among the poorest people in the world , and drug use is more widespread in developed countries than in developing countries .
Cocaine and other drugs are more tightly linked to wealthier parts of the world.
similarly , in many countries , the prevalence of drug use is higher among the socioeconomically privileged .
but the rate of conversion to addiction is higher among people with lower social and economic status .
Data from a few countries suggest that harmful smoking patterns are associated with disease and low income .
these patterns are less common in more affluent social classes .
The economic constraints caused by the global COVID-19 crisis are likely to exacerbate the risks faced by the most vulnerable populations, including drug users.

For example, changes in the labor market, such as rising unemployment, have historically been linked to increases in drug use, and this pandemic has already forced millions of people around the world to lose their jobs.

The COVID-19 pandemic may further expand the illicit drug market, as the pandemic may lead to more farmers to increase or engage in illicit cultivation, or because of the reduced control capacity of the national regulatory authorities, or because more people may be forced to engage in illicit activities due to the economic crisis.

The restrictions on travel related to COVID-19 have led to a reduction in air and land traffic, but may have increased maritime transport, which has a lower risk of interception and more volume than air or land smuggling.
Recently, there have been reports that cocaine is being smuggled from South America to Europe by sea.
complexity enhancement
the stable presence of uncontrolled substances , but the emergence of new types of opioids with potential for harm , is complicating the drug market .
In addition to marijuana, cocaine and heroin, hundreds of synthetic drugs have been added, many of which are not under international control. The non-medical use of drugs is also increasing rapidly.
there are about 500 new active ingredients in the domestic market of member states each year.
currently , most of these are stimulants , followed by synthetic cannabinoid receptor agonists and a few opioid analogs .
although the overall number of new psychotropic drugs has stabilized , the proportions have changed .
of the newly identified neuroactive substance types in 2014, only 2 % were classified as novel opioids , but this number had risen to 9 % by 2018 .

among the new synthetic psychoactive substances , many are similar to fentanyl , and their effects and risks have been documented , with overdose deaths in North America and elsewhere , although to a lesser degree .
In North America, fentanyl is used as an adulterant for heroin and other opioids (including heroin and methylfentanyl ) and as a precursor for counterfeit fentanyl analogs .

some evidence suggests that injection of new psychoactive substances is also occurring in Europe : a study of residual syringes in six European cities found that many of them were contaminated with substances that produce stimulation >
the use of 2 new psychostimulants may gradually become entrenched in the weak subculture
a single new class of psychotropic agents has rarely formed a large market .
but evidence from Europe suggests that synthetic cannabinoids are a serious problem among homeless and prison populations.
twenty2 countries reported the use of new psychoactive substances in prisons , with most countries identifying synthetic cannabinoids as the primary challenge .

The control of precursor chemicals for the synthesis of illicit drugs has forced drug manufacturers to innovate. Many precursor chemicals used in the synthesis of illicit drugs such as buprenorphine, methylbuprenorphine, and "nodding pills" have been placed under international control.
dealers and manufacturers are looking for alternatives , not just to substances with looser controls , but also to chemicals specifically designed to evade controls , known as "designer precursors ."
restrictive measures aimed at preventing the spread of COVID @-19 are likely to further squeeze those who rely on precursor chemicals for their illicit drug production .

Evidence from Mexico suggests that this has become a reality: reports say that a shortage of isobutyraldehyde precursors imported from Asia in March 2020 caused the price of isobutyraldehyde in Mexico and the US to rise.
the market is in a state of constant change
synthetic opioids replace heroin in Central Asia and the Russian Federation
the heroin market in Central Asia and the Russian Federation appears to have changed between 2008 and 2018 .

The number of fentanyl seized by Russian federal authorities has dropped by about 80 percent, and the number of people receiving treatment for opioid use has dropped significantly, as the use of synthetic opioids has declined.
But the market for stimulants seems to be growing.
there is evidence that methylamphetamine and various cathinones , including methcathinone and a - p - trifluoromethylbenzylamphetamine , are readily available on the Russian drug market .
The number of secretly produced illegal drug processing sites discovered by Russian authorities has surged dramatically in recent years, with a 152% increase in 2018 alone, the authorities said.
Afghanistan and Iraq Methamphetamine Markets Grow
as early as 2012 , investigations of hospital , prison , and other personnel had already revealed the importance of methylbenzylamine in Iraq .
methylphenidate has become another major drug of concern in addition to fentanyl and carfentanil.
A study in 2015 further confirmed these findings, with addicts reporting that marijuana was harder to obtain than "flunitrazepam" or methamphetamine.

Recently, Iraqi authorities have discovered several methyl bromide processing points, and the drug control department has expressed concern over a large number of fake methamphetamine hydrochloride imports. A methyl bromide processing point used these drugs as precursors.
In Afghanistan , methyl isocyanide production appears to have begun in 2014.
since then , the seizure quantity of methylamphetamine has been steadily increasing .
However, the seizure quantity in the first half of 2019 was 657kg - a significant increase compared to the previous year.
In other countries, large quantities of methylamphetamine, believed to originate in Afghanistan, have been seized, indicating that production is on the rise.
policy changes and trends
the legalization of nonmedical marijuana use has been associated with increased marijuana use in states where it is legal .
Canada, Uruguay and the United States have 11 jurisdictions that allow the production of cannabis products for non-medical use.

in most jurisdictions , marijuana use has increased substantially since its legalization , although similar trends have been observed in jurisdictions that have not legalized nonmedical marijuana use .

In Colorado and Washington, the first two states to legalize recreational marijuana, the number of adults using marijuana, especially daily or almost daily use, has increased significantly, surpassing the national average since 2012.
All indicators show that the use of marijuana in Bolivia has increased since 2011, and last month it almost doubled.
This suggests that the increase is mainly due to frequent and heavy use of marijuana .
Canadian short-term data also shows that as the legal market expanded from 2018 to 2019, usage increased.
However, 40 percent of marijuana users still obtained some products illegally in 2019.
Is the global marijuana crop seizure decline due to marijuana legalization?
In 2018, global cannabis seizures reached their lowest levels in the past 20 years, due to a 84% decline in seizures in North America over the past decade.

in contrast , the number of arrests in other parts of the world nearly doubled during the same period . The arrest data suggest that policies intended to liberalize marijuana markets are having a significant impact .
monitoring of new psychoactive substances appears to have a dampening effect on their availability within the country , but the effectiveness of this monitoring is still difficult to assess .
some countries with different regulatory systems for new psychoactive substances have different rates of use of these substances .
in other countries , the use of new psychoactive substances has decreased after legislation was passed .

vulnerable populations are disproportionately harmed by both legal and illicit opioid markets and are more likely to use prescription opioids for pain management and palliative care in high @-@ income countries .
in 2018 , more than 90 % of the medical consumption of opioids were in high income countries .
About 50% are in North America, 40% in Europe, and 2% in Oceania.
These countries account for about 12 percent of the world's population.
an estimated 88 % of the world 's population live in low @-@ and middle @-@ income countries , but they account for less than 10 % of global consumption of opioids for nonmedical use .
the barriers to obtaining opioid analgesics are multifactorial and include legislation , culture , health systems , and prescribing practices .

EU Summit Debates Refugee Policy, EU Official: Refugee Process is a Bottleneck - China News
EU summit debates refugee policy, official: bottlenecks at every step of the process

According to the report of the French news agency on February 10, at the latest EU summit, the chairman of the European Commission, Jean-Claude Juncker, said that the EU leaders agreed to adopt more rigorous policies to expel illegal immigrants.

The move is seen as a response to the growing concern over the increasing number of illegal immigrants in Europe, and the core issue of the EU is that the number of illegal immigrants who can be deported is very small.

According to the conference document, the leaders of the European Union called on the European Parliament to "immediately mobilize a large amount of European Union funds" to strengthen the external borders through infrastructure and monitoring measures.
However, the EU and its member states have been arguing over the cost of the border wall.
Fondelien has repeatedly said that EU funds will not pay for the costs.

But some diplomats from member states said that if the EU could take over the installation of cameras, observation towers and other basic facilities along the external borders, it would help countries to leap out of their budgets and speed up the construction process.

The European Union is facing a "near permanent crisis" in its refugee system, as officials admit that every step of the process is being hampered by limited capacity and overwhelmed national immigration authorities unable to prevent "unlimited" asylum applications being made in EU countries, Euractiv.com reported.
The European Commission estimates that last year, 920,000 asylum applications were received by EU countries, an increase of almost half compared to the previous year.
At the same time, the European Union recorded more than 330,000 illegal border crossings last year.
Against this background, the summit also agreed on a "principle" that EU countries can return illegal immigrants to another member state based on the judgment of the other state's court.
In addition, the EU leaders agreed to "increase the use of the concept of secure countries", which will open the way for the EU to form a common list.
(Source: The Guardian, author: Ni Ruifeng)
US upgrades "chip war" to rebuild global semiconductor industry - China News

Recently, the US has made a significant upgrade in its "chip war" against China. First, the Netherlands and Japan agreed to the US's pressure and started to control the export of semiconductor manufacturing equipment to China. Then, the media reported that the US government was considering cutting off all connections between US suppliers and Huawei and prohibiting US suppliers from providing any products to Huawei. The Biden government also prepared to issue an administrative order to restrict US investment in China'

In recent years, the US has never stopped its actions to suppress China's semiconductor development. On the one hand, it has precisely suppressed the supply chain of Chinese semiconductors. On the other hand, it has built a semiconductor industry alliance to completely "disconnect" China from advanced semiconductor industries.

Whether it is the "Technology Alliance" established by the United States to attract South Korea, or the "Semiconductor Quad Alliance" established by the United States, Japan, South Korea, and Taiwan, or the "Semiconductor Industry Chain" established by the United States through the "Quadrilateral Mechanism" and the "Framework for Indo-Pacific Economic Cooperation", the United States is trying to build a closed production and supply chain system under
However, the US’s “hybrid warfare” against China is also “wounding the enemy a thousand times and wounding oneself eight hundred times.”

Recently, the well-known semiconductor manufacturing equipment supplier, Greenspring Group, announced that due to the impact of the latest round of export restrictions on the production of semiconductor manufacturing equipment in China, the group will dismiss 1,300 full-time employees, and plans to dismiss 1,400 temporary employees in the next two quarters.
ASML, the world's largest lithography equipment manufacturer, recently warned that a ban on exporting semiconductor manufacturing equipment to China could lead to a rise in semiconductor prices.

According to the analysis of American media, after the US government imposed a very heavy pressure on China's semiconductor and semiconductor industries, many American companies were seriously affected, including semiconductor and semiconductor design companies, manufacturers of crystal production equipment, and semiconductor manufacturers themselves.
The so-called US suppression of China's advanced semiconductor industry has dragged down the global semiconductor industry chain and supply chain.
Semiconductor industry is a high technology and knowledge intensive industry, and a global semiconductor industry chain has already formed.
According to experts, the entire production process of semiconductor products needs to cross the border of more than 70 countries, and the entire process takes 100 days.
Although the US semiconductor industry has a strong foundation, it is relatively weak in manufacturing, especially in advanced process skills, and is heavily dependent on the Asia-Pacific region.

Even if the US is trying to lead the advanced semiconductor supply chain to develop into a "small circle" of localized development, the global semiconductor-related industry's regional distribution and interdependence are difficult to change.
The United States is strongly "reshaping" and "de-Chinese" the semiconductor industry chain, and re-creating the global semiconductor industry.
The chip is the core of the future global industry, and the development of the chip industry cannot be separated from the participation of all countries in the world.

In recent years, the United States has taken a series of unilateral actions, such as the CHIPS and Science Act, the 2022 US Competition Act, and the CHIPS and Science Act, to consolidate its leading position in domestic technology by using technology hegemony; and it has adopted a "carrot and stick" approach to its allies, forcing Intel, TSMC, Samsung and other chip manufacturing companies to set up factories in the United States,
In the short term, the US has indeed caused trouble for China's semiconductor industry and related industries, but it has also brought real benefits.

But in the long run, the US’s pressure and coercion will push China’s semiconductor industry to continuously break through, and will make it lose a huge Chinese market, ultimately greatly weakening the innovative desire and ability of US technology companies, and damaging the development of the global semiconductor industry.

First batch of personal pension fund financial products on sale, minimum holding period is 360 days - Xinhua Net
First batch of personal pension financial products on sale
Seven products are available for the home appliance package, with the shortest holding period being 360 days.
The personal pension financial product finally went online.

On February 10, the Chinese Financial Network released the first batch of personal pension financial product names. Seven personal pension financial products of the Workers Bank Financial, the Agricultural Bank Financial and the China Postal Savings Bank Financial were officially launched.
So far, the "warehouse" of personal pension account has gathered personal pension savings, personal pension financial management, personal pension insurance, and personal pension public fund.

According to the introduction, the first batch of personal pension financial products are all public fund-type clean value-type open products, of which there are 5 new products and 2 continuing products. Except for one mixed product, the other 6 products are all fixed income products.

Reporters from Beijing Youth Daily saw that the five new products were all fixed income products from the Industrial and Commercial Bank of China (ICBC) Asset Management, and the shortest holding period was 365 days, 540 days, 720 days, and 1080 days, with corresponding performance benchmarks (annualized) of 3.70%-4.20%, 4.10%-4.60

The remaining new product is "Postal Savings Funds Adding Hengjin No. 1095", which is also a fixed income product, and the fundraising started on February 10 and ended on February 19. The risk level is II.

Among the two continuous products, one is the People's Bank of China Agricultural Development Bank's "Agricultural Development Bank Dynamic" 360-day Technology Innovation RMB Financial Product, which is a hybrid investment product with a risk level of 3.

Another continuous product is "Postal Savings Bank Financial Addition Hengjin No. 1, with a minimum holding period of 365 days", which is a fixed income type. It started to collect funds on December 30 last year and officially started to operate on January 4 this year. The accumulated net value on February 8 was 1.0011.

According to the "Opinions of the Office of the State Council on Promoting the Exhibition of Personal Retirement Savings", the financial products that can be invested with the funds in the personal retirement savings account include bank financial products, savings accounts, commercial pension insurance, public funds, etc.

The first batch of personal pension fund financial products was sold, marking that the investors of personal pension fund can officially purchase financial products through the personal pension fund account.
The CBIRC issued the Temporary Measures for the Administration of Personal Retirement Savings Business of Commercial Banks and Wealth Management Companies in November last year.

According to the Regulations, the participants can purchase personal pension products, including personal pension savings, personal pension financial products, personal pension insurance products, and personal pension public fund products, through their personal pension insurance account.

Subsequently, the Ministry of Human Resources and Social Security, the Ministry of Finance and the State Administration of Taxation issued notices to clarify that the personal pension system will be launched in 36 pilot cities and regions including Beijing, Tianjin, Shijiazhuang and Xiong’an New Area in Hebei Province, and Yincheng City in Shanxi Province.

By the end of 2022, the number of people participating in the personal pension scheme was 19.54 million, the number of people paying premiums was 6.13 million, and the total premiums paid were RMB 14.2 billion.
Previously, the participating banks only listed personal pension savings, personal pension insurance products and personal pension fund public offerings.
Now that personal pension financial products have gathered, how should investors choose?

Compared with other personal pension products, the trial pension product and personal pension product have three features in common, said an expert from the research and development department of the Bank of Communications.

First, the stability is enhanced, the risk management mechanism is more complete, the investment strategy and concept are more stable, and the non-parent third-party independent custody is implemented.

The second is long-term, the trial period of the pension financial product is more than 5 years, the next individual pension financial product has the shortest holding period of 1 year, and it is encouraged to hold for 3 years or more.

The third is the inclusiveness. The threshold for purchasing the products is low, and the purchase point is generally 1 yuan, and some are as low as 0.01 yuan. The rates of storage fees, management fees, and other fees are more favorable.
Experts suggest that investors should choose products based on their features and risk tolerance.

Personal pension savings have the characteristics of longer term, higher interest rates and higher safety, which are suitable for people with weak risk tolerance; personal pension insurance products focus on guaranteeing, which are more suitable for people who cannot bear investment risks and can accept stable returns; while personal pension financial products and public fund products have no guarantee of principal and interest, have certain investment risks, but have high expected returns, which are suitable for people with certain financial knowledge and high risk tolerance.
Reporter: Cheng Jie; Editor: Pool Chi-bo
Fitness Industry Should Overcome Trust Crisis - China News
Another large fitness club "exploded"?
Recently, the issue of the rights of members of the fitness club Jinyehen has attracted public attention.

After the Spring Festival, many members found that their stores were not operating normally. Subsequently, rumors about the bankruptcy and flight of the organization caused panic among members, leading to intervention by the public security and human resources departments.

Finally, the relevant person in charge of the organization came forward to respond, promising to make efforts to protect the legitimate rights and interests of employees and members, and the storm was finally calmed down.

Some individual fitness centers have encountered management problems, and some stores have temporarily closed. Consumers can be calm and wait for the problem to be resolved. Why is the first reaction of many members "something is wrong"?
The controversy over the rights of fitness club members is a deep-rooted crisis of trust in the industry.
Traditional fitness clubs in China generally adopt the prepaid fee model, and the underlying logic of their development is “earning money from customers who don’t come”.

Through pre-sale membership cards to obtain cash flow, continuously open new stores, it seems to be able to form a cycle, but in fact, it is a case of "rat eating rice", and it is impossible to form a stable profit model.
The negative news about fitness clubs and running clubs has been frequent, which has caused a strong impact on consumers' confidence.
From the market prospect, fitness clubs are certainly a good business with “money-making potential”.
The fitness race, although it has its ups and downs, has always been a focus of capital.
Multiple data show that the heat in the field of cultural consumption is continuously rising, and the market is continuously warming up.

Specifically, in the fitness market, with the steady improvement of residents’ living standards, the concept of healthy living has deeply rooted in people’s hearts, and the fitness industry has great potential for development.
The better the situation, the more important it is to develop quality.

However, individual institutions are blindly optimistic about the fitness market after the consumption recovery, and they are blowing the horn of expanding territory and opening new stores, and they are pouring all the investment funds into the construction of new stores.

It is undeniable that many organizations have left, and the industry has been reorganized due to the impact of the epidemic. At this time, some powerful enterprises have selectively increased their purchasing power and restructured, and it is not uncommon to have new opportunities.
However, to enter a virtuous circle and move up the long-term prosperity road of Kangzhuang, the industry must change the traditional mode and change the operating strategy.
Only by being stable and reliable, rebuilding consumer trust and confidence, can we truly win the market and the future.

Compared with the fierce competition of opening new stores to seize the market, the fitness industry currently needs to focus on optimizing services and stabilizing users with high-quality development.
First, you need to retain users through service.

Fitness clubs belong to the service industry. Its essence is to adhere to "customer-oriented", to closely around the needs of customers, and to put the focus on the improvement and upgrading of services.
Second, we need to improve the user experience through digital transformation.
For example, the popular online fitness club model realizes that users pay by the class and choose the location.
At the same time, body data and motion data can be effectively utilized and meet social needs, and realize the complete service loop from online to offline.
Without personal trainers and high-priced annual memberships, users' concerns about "running away" from fitness centers have been reduced, and trust has been increased.
In addition, we should actively explore multiple business models.

Now, sports consumption has evolved from single service to scene consumption, and fitness clubs are likely to become new consumption channels. Surrounding products such as sports supplements and fitness equipment or becoming new profit points will provide consumers with more choices.

Multi-indicator data decay, Taiwan's economy starts the year poorly - China News

Xinhua News Agency, Taipei, February 11 (Reporters: Zhao Bo, Huang Yi) The export trade volume has been "black for five months", the manufacturing purchasing manager index (PMI) has been "tight for seven months", and the consumer price index (CPI) has been "3-digit"... Recently, the Taiwan authorities have successively released the economic data for January 2023.
Experts believe that the Taiwan economy has performed poorly at the beginning of the year, and the pressure of growth is not small.

According to the financial affairs management department of the local government, Taiwan's exports in January this year were US$31.51 billion, down by 21.2% year-on-year, and this was the fifth consecutive month of negative growth.
The export value of 11 major export commodities decreased compared with the same period last year.
The decline in rubber and its products and optical equipment was the most significant, with a decrease of 37.6% and 35.7% respectively.
The export of electronic components decreased by 20.1% year-on-year, the largest decrease in the past 11 years.
Among them, the integrated circuit decreased by 18.3%, the largest decline in the past 14 years.

The director of the statistics department of the Ministry of Industry and Information Technology, Cai Meina, said that this shows that the demand for consumer electronics is weakening, and the electronics industry is entering the adjustment period.
According to statistics, Taiwan's imports and exports in January fell by 23.4 billion US dollars, the lowest level in nearly 3 years.

The Ministry of Finance’s financial management department believes that the global demand for terminals has decreased, the industry has adjusted inventory to suppress the willingness of merchants to purchase, and the export situation is very poor in the short term, and Taiwan’s exports in the first quarter of this year are likely to decline more than expected.

According to the Taiwan Institute of Economic Research, the manufacturing Purchasing Managers Index (PMI) in Taiwan in January was adjusted for seasonality to 40.4%, a decrease of 3.3 percentage points from the previous month, and a seventh consecutive month of contraction.
In the economic monitoring index system, PMI is the threshold line of 50%, and the index is greater than 50% represents the expansion of the economy, otherwise it is contraction.
In January, the five components of Taiwan's PMI were tightened, with new orders, production, and employment shrinking, delivery times from suppliers decreased, and inventory was tightened.

All six industries reported a narrowing PMI, with the order of narrowing speed being power and machinery equipment industry (35.1%), electronic and optoelectronic industry (35.2%), chemical and pharmaceutical and biotechnology industry (39.2%), basic raw materials industry (42.4%), automobile industry (42.6%), and food and textile industry (45.7%).

In terms of prices, the “Finance Ministry” of the Taiwan government announced that the CPI of Taiwan in January this year increased by 3.04% year-on-year, breaking the 3% mark again since July last year.
Among them, the price of vegetables rose by 28.25%, creating a new high in the past 17 months.

Cao Zhihong, a special commissioner of the Taiwan Ministry of Finance, admitted that the increase in the price of vegetables was greater than expected, excluding the Spring Festival factor, the average CPI in January and February this year should be close to 2.71% in December last year, and the inflationary pressure still exists and is still high.
Looking at Taiwan's economy this year, based on the reports of United Daily News and "Yahoo Finance" and other local media, experts expressed pessimism.

Wu Da Ren, professor of economics at National Taiwan University, analyzed that the export decline may cause cash flow problems for export manufacturing enterprises, and the risk of debt default will increase.
At the same time, the reduction in orders leads to a reduction in labor costs for manufacturers, which affects the labor market and family economics, and in turn affects consumption ability.

Qiu Dashu, a researcher at the Taiwan Economic Research Institute, believes that the inflation situation in Europe and America has not been resolved, and the demand continues to shrink, so the estimated decline in Taiwan's exports will continue into the first half of the year.
Due to the fact that Taiwan's economy is heavily reliant on exports, the economic growth rate for the year will be lower than last year due to the downturn in exports.

Report: The number of returning students seeking employment in 2022 reached a new high - China News
The top 10 countries for returning students to seek employment in 2022. Source: 2022 China Returnee Employment Survey Report.

Beijing, February 11 (reporter Meng Rui) The recently published “2022 China Returnee Employment Survey Report” (hereinafter referred to as the “report”) shows that the number of graduating overseas students in 2022 increased by 8.6% year-on-year, and the number of returning students seeking employment reached a new high. The demand for foreign talent from Chinese enterprises is also on the rise.

The report pointed out that the number of returning students seeking employment in China has significantly increased since 2020, and the number of graduating students seeking employment in China has also increased.
Compared with 2021, the number of students who will study abroad in 2022 increased by 8.6% year-on-year, and the number of students returning to work after studying abroad reached a new high.

According to the distribution of countries where returning students seek employment, the UK has the highest proportion, accounting for 41.4%, followed by Australia (20.3%) and the United States (9%), which is consistent with 2021.

From the perspective of year-on-year growth, the number of applicants for overseas study from Malaysia, Japan, and Singapore in 2022 increased significantly, with year-on-year growth rates of 66.1%, 50.9%, and 37.7%, respectively.
The number of prospective international students from Canada, Germany, the United States and Australia has decreased compared to last year.
The first week of the Spring Festival in 2023 will be the first week of the tide of supply and demand for returning talents. Source: 2022 China Returned Talents Employment Survey Report

According to the survey, 58% of the students who decided to return to China thought that "life in China is more convenient", 40% decided to return to China because they "feel more at home in the Chinese culture", 32% thought that "there are more job opportunities in China", and 22% thought that "the economic activities in China will recover faster and there will be more job opportunities".
Data shows that the demand for foreign talents from domestic enterprises is rapidly released, and the demand for returning talents is on the rise.

In the first week after the Spring Festival of 2023, the number of priority positions for returning overseas Chinese and the number of returning overseas Chinese seeking employment in the country both showed an upward trend. The number of priority positions for returning overseas Chinese on February 3 was 11% higher than that on January 28, and the number of returning overseas Chinese seeking employment increased by 27%.

From the industry, in the 2022 priority jobs in maritime, the positions from the education/training industry accounted for 27.8%, ranking first, followed by professional services/consulting and internet/e-commerce industries, which accounted for 14.3% and 11.1% respectively.
The number of returning overseas Chinese seeking employment in China in recent years - Source: "2022 China Returned Overseas Chinese Employment Survey Report"

From the perspective of salary, the average recruitment salary of the priority position of sea has been rising continuously for three consecutive years, reaching 14,680 yuan/month (RMB, the same below) in 2022, which is 961 yuan higher than that of 2021, and the growth rate is 7%.

According to the region, the intention of the returning population to go to the first-line cities, second-line cities and third-line cities and below in 2022 has been improved, and the proportion of the investment was 31%, 15.7%, and 14.3% respectively, all of which were higher than the proportion of the investment in 2021.
For the harvest of overseas study, 52.7% of the returning students said it met their expectations, up 2.8 percentage points from last year (49.9%).
Twenty-eight point two percent of refugees said their expectations were exceeded or greatly exceeded, a rate higher than the 25.4 percent in 2021.

Sina.com, February 11 -- According to the "Shenzhen Work Information" WeChat public account, the Shenzhen Industrial and Information Technology Bureau recently issued the "Shenzhen Rapid Pioneer Urban Construction Action Plan".

It is proposed to build a high-speed, large-capacity, and low-latency super broadband network by the end of 2023, and realize the network construction goal of "double hundred million, all-optical, one millisecond, and all-connected", and build the first and leading super-fast leading city in the country and the world.
The plan proposes to speed up the upgrade of 1000Mbps optical network.

Supporting the telecommunications industry to increase the optimization degree of 5G networks in key areas and places, 10,000 new 5G base stations will be added annually, with the average download speed in the city reaching 500Mbps and the upload speed reaching 100Mbps. The download speed in key areas will reach 1000Mbps and the upload speed will reach 200Mbps,
Building a high-quality wireless local area network at the city level.

Establishing public wireless local area network (WLAN) service standards, promoting the upgrading of WLAN in densely populated and information consumption areas in the city, and providing 10G access capabilities.

In accordance with the construction of the city-wide public wireless LAN unified certification monitoring platform of "Deepi Network", the "one-time certification, seamless roaming, and intelligent switching" is realized, and the public service capability of the social self-built AP (wireless access point) operated by the operating subject is supported to be included in the certification monitoring platform.
By the end of 2023, the number of upgraded access points will reach at least 20,000.

In addition, the plan proposes to build a high-quality all-optical power grid, construct a multi-level computing power supply system, accelerate the construction of key communication networks, and enhance the ability of Internet application services.
The plan is clear that the collaborative construction of the sensing system of the building.

Explore the construction of the urban perception terminal management mode based on the "open source Huawei Mongoose" operating system, reduce the cost of interconnection, accelerate the construction of urban-level perception sensing platforms, promote the urban Internet of Things platform, the professional Internet of Things platform network and data interconnection.

Deepen the application of material sensing in urban management, public services, public security, transportation and other fields, expand the fixed sensing and intelligent networked vehicles as mobile sensing collection channels, and expand the fixed sensing and intelligent networked vehicles as mobile sensing collection channels.

By the end of 2023, the number of smart terminals in the water, electricity, and gas network will exceed 9 million, and 20 or more demonstration projects of multi-functional intelligent poles will be built.

The plan also mentions strengthening the integration of satellite and ground communications, building the basic facilities of low-altitude networks, and promoting the deep coverage of 5G networks at sea.

At the same time, it will promote the deep coverage of marine 5G networks, build an ecosystem for industrial innovation and development, and support the holding of top-level competitions and activities.

New Variables Emerge in China's E-commerce Industry: How to Make Delivery "King"?
-chinanews.com
China News Service, February 11: Title: New Variables Emerge in China’s E-commerce Industry: How to Make Delivery “King”?
Xia Bin, reporter of China News Finance
We entered the e-commerce industry a bit late, but we realized from the start that in order to stand out from the millions of stores, content is very important.
"90s" girl Fang Fang, originally from Guangdong, now runs a supplementary food store on Douyin, helping a 30-year-old offline store to "bloom online".
The video, which mimics the style of old Cantonese movies and is set to classic Cantonese songs, was posted on @芳芳一人食 TikTok account, and the beautiful video is a fresh sight to behold.
At the recent Douyin e-commerce "Seeking Peers·Quality Content Sharing Special", Fangfang, as a representative of quality creators, spoke and introduced her experience and feelings of daily creation.

She said at the scene: "The carefully edited video attracted a lot of attention from netizens, many people were interested in my family's ingredients and wanted to cook together, and the road was suddenly opened.
Fang Fang, a 50-year-old woman, has used live streaming to sell supplementary food materials, and has sold up to 300,000 items in a single live streaming session, saving a dying local store.
"No content, no e-commerce", with the continuous development of short video and live e-commerce, people's requirements and standards for e-commerce content are entering a new stage.
In the early stage of live broadcasting, the live room often used low-priced discounts to attract users, and the price advantage seemed to be the only selling point at that time.

In recent years, there are not only phenomena like Liu Zhihong and Dongfang Zhuanxuan, but also many experts and merchants who are not well known to the public, who have emerged in vertical fields. They have improved their long-term operating benefits by continuously creating high-quality content that fits their brand image.

High Yong, the CEO of Douyin e-commerce star author operation, introduced that in the past year, 6.27 million creators have turned their content into money through Douyin e-commerce, and their content creation has increased by 252%, and the total transaction amount has doubled.
behind these numbers, we can feel the vitality and the thriving author ecosystem.
"said Guo Yachen.

Beijing Normal University Communication Innovation and Future Media Experiment Platform has previously published the "E-commerce Industry Content Ecosystem Health Index (ECHI) Report", which analyzed the importance of the "new variable" - high-quality content in the current e-commerce industry from the data dimension, and used the index to evaluate the content ecosystem situation of 27 mainstream e-commerce platforms in China.
According to the report, the e-commerce industry health index ranking is: Douyin e-commerce, Kuaishou, Taobao, Pinduoduo, JD.com.

The report believes that the e-commerce content ecology is a comprehensive concept that integrates e-commerce and content, but not all content can be integrated with e-commerce. Only high-quality PGC (professional generated content) and UGC (user-generated content) can be integrated with e-commerce. The higher the value of the content platform, the richer the consumption and promotion scenarios, and the higher the possibility of e-commerce integration, the stronger the commercial value

At the scene, Professor Yim Guoming, the vice chairman of the China Media Economics and Management Professional Committee of Beijing Normal University Journalism School, analyzed and interpreted the report.

He said that in terms of content value, the e-commerce industry has already moved from the stage of “consumption accessibility” to the stage of “consumption quality”, and high-quality, professional and differentiated content is the “hard currency” of the e-commerce industry.

At the same time, content has become the foundation and key to the development of e-commerce in a new stage, and knowledge-based content, professional knowledge, and KOL (Key Opinion Leader) have become standard features of e-commerce live broadcasts.
Looking to the future development of e-commerce industry, Yim Guoming put forward two suggestions.

One is from the perspective of improving the health and quality of the e-commerce content ecosystem, promoting the overall improvement of the health and quality of the e-commerce content ecosystem, building positive standards for content creation and management, and achieving dynamic balance between the e-commerce industry content ecosystem health index.

Another one is from the perspective of external ecology, to realize the healthy development of the content e-commerce industry and the value co-creation and collaboration with the external environment.

“In the future, the e-commerce industry will need more data and support from artificial intelligence to make stable predictions for future development; in addition, we need to provide a more regulated and healthy growth space for merchants, so that the value of enterprises, users, products and services in the e-commerce industry can be coordinated, and a healthy content ecology can be created.
"(end)"

The launch of financing and pledging trading at the North Exchange is an important measure to continuously promote the construction of the North Exchange market system, improve the transaction mechanism, and enhance the pricing function of the secondary market.

The financing and margin system is beneficial to enriching the trading strategies of investors, satisfying the diversified trading needs of investors, promoting the discovery of market prices, and further improving the market liquidity.

Next, the Shenzhen Stock Exchange will continue to do the work of various guarantees for financing and financing under the leadership of the China Securities Regulatory Commission, and will guide the enrichment of the transaction system tools to meet the needs of investors, perfect the relevant supporting mechanisms, and strive to build a first-class exchange for service innovation of small and medium-sized enterprises.

Continuously operate the shift duty and sentry duty system and strengthen the safety management of the site.

(German Voice Chinese Website) The Biden administration will add six Chinese entities to the blacklist on Friday (February 10) for suspected involvement in the spy balloon program.

The US Commerce Department said that these five Chinese companies and one research institute help modernize the Chinese military, especially the aviation and aerospace projects, including helicopters and aircraft.
Companies on the blacklist have a hard time getting U.S. technology exports.
The list, known as the "entity list," bars companies from buying U.S. technology or goods unless they receive a special export license from the U.S. Commerce Department.

The companies on the blacklist are: Beijing South Sky Technology Co., Ltd., the 48th Research Institute of China Electronics Technology Group Corporation, Dongguan Lingkong Remote Sensing Technology Co., Ltd., Tianma Aviation Technology Group Co., Ltd., Guangzhou Tianhai Xing Aviation Technology Co., Ltd., and Shanxi Tianma Aviation Technology Group Co., Ltd.
Before that, the White House said it was considering broader measures to "expose and counter" China's larger surveillance activities that threaten US national security.
The balloon incident has further strained the relationship between the US and China, and US Secretary of State Blinken has canceled his visit to China.

The Chinese government has lodged a solemn protest with the U.S. Embassy in China, condemning the U.S. for the serious violation of the sovereignty and territorial integrity of China, and severely damaging the efforts and progress of the China-U.S. relationship.

Based on existing evidence from the wreckage and information from China's procurement platform, the US government concluded that the manufacturer of the balloon "had a direct relationship with the Chinese People's Liberation Army" and was approved by the Chinese military.

Mao Ning, spokesperson of China's Ministry of Foreign Affairs, said at a press conference on Friday that China has repeatedly explained the situation and clarified its position regarding the unexpected incident that a Chinese unmanned aerial vehicle mistakenly entered the U.S. airspace due to force majeure.
According to the website of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs, she added that the relevant resolutions of the US Congress were purely political manipulation and hype.
China strongly opposed and firmly rejected.

Matthew Axelrod, the assistant secretary of commerce for export enforcement, said that the action today shows that the joint efforts to find out and prevent China from using spy balloons to violate the airspace of the United States and more than 40 countries have been successful.
A staff member of Guangzhou Tianhai Shengong Aviation Technology Co., Ltd. told Reuters that he was not aware of the sanctions and refused to comment further.
The Chinese Embassy in the United States has not yet commented on the information.

"---The boy who was trapped under the rubble for 129 hours asked the rescue workers who saved him.
A man from Kahramanmaras holds his cat that was rescued
Miraculous rescue cases have brought a glimmer of hope to the otherwise disheartening search and rescue work, but at the same time, the number of people in need of rescue has been on the rise.
According to the official statistics, more than 20,000 people have died in Turkey due to the earthquake on Monday, and the death toll in Syria is estimated to be more than 3,500.
Despite experts saying that people can survive for more than a week after being trapped in rubble, the hope of finding more survivors is fading.
Rescue workers were still using thermal imaging cameras to search for signs of life beneath the rubble.
At the same time, the focus of the rescue work began to shift to helping those who were still alive but in dire need of assistance.
UN official: 'Century-long' disaster in region

Martin Griffiths, the UN deputy secretary-general in charge of humanitarian affairs and emergency response coordination, said at a press conference in Turkey that the earthquake was the "worst disaster in the region in a century."
He also praised Turkey's "unusual" response to the disaster.
He also told Reuters that he hoped to provide aid to areas controlled by the Syrian government and the opposition, but said that the situation was "not clear."
The United Nations has pledged an additional $25 million in aid to the earthquake-stricken population of Syria.
Earlier this week, the United Nations announced that it would be donating $25 million to help Turkey and Syria with their earthquake relief efforts.
The 60-year-old strongest earthquake in the world
Chile Earthquake (1960)
At 3:11 p.m. local time on May 22, 1960, the largest earthquake ever recorded in human history occurred in Valdivia, Chile, with a magnitude of 9.5.
In just ten minutes, the entire city of Wadviya was reduced to rubble.
A massive tsunami was triggered by the earthquake and hit the Chilean coastline, causing waves as high as 25 meters.
The tsunami reached as far as Japan and the Philippines.
The number of casualties and economic losses caused by this disaster are difficult to estimate.
The 60-year-old strongest earthquake in the world
The Great Alaskan Earthquake (1964)
March 27, 1964 was a Friday, and it was also the day of the crucifixion of Jesus.
The largest earthquake in the history of North America occurred in Alaska today, with a magnitude of 9.2.
Until 2006, the Alaskan earthquake was the third largest earthquake in recorded history.
During the earthquake, a fault line between the Pacific Plate and the North American Plate broke near William Prince Bay, near the entrance to the bay.
The quake lasted for three to five minutes in most areas.
The ground movement caused a huge tsunami with a height of 67 meters.
Since it was a holiday, the school and many companies were closed.
The earthquake finally caused 139 deaths.
Nine people died directly from the earthquake, while 130 others died from the tsunami caused by the earthquake.
The 60-year-old strongest earthquake in the world
Tangshan Earthquake (1976)
On July 28, 1976, two strong earthquakes of magnitude 7 or above occurred in Tangshan, Hebei Province, and Pingnan County in 16 hours.
The epicenter is 23 kilometers below the surface.
The entire traffic, communication, water supply and power supply of Tangshan City were cut off, and the city was leveled in a short time.
The capital Beijing, 140 kilometers away, also felt strong tremors.
According to the official statistics, a total of 242,769 people died and 164,851 people were seriously injured in all the affected areas including Beijing and Tianjin due to the earthquake.
The Tangshan earthquake is the second deadliest earthquake in China's history, second only to the Jiajing earthquake in 1556.
But foreign scientists estimate that the earthquake may cause at least 650,000 deaths.
The 60-year-old strongest earthquake in the world
The Indian Ocean earthquake (2004)
On December 26, 2004, a 9.1 to 9.3 magnitude earthquake occurred 160 kilometers off the western coast of Aceh Province, Sumatra, Indonesia, with a depth of 30 kilometers.
The tsunami, triggered by the earthquake, had waves as high as 15 to 30 meters.
The Pacific coast is affected by 14 countries, and the most serious disaster areas include Aceh Province in Indonesia, Phuket and Phi Phi Island in Thailand, Sri Lanka and Tamil Nadu in India.

The earthquake occurred during the peak tourist season, and the affected areas were crowded with tourists and local residents, resulting in many tourists who were enjoying their vacation on the beach and local residents who were working on the beach being swept away by the sea, making many people missing.
At least 300,000 people are estimated to have been killed or gone missing.
The 60-year-old strongest earthquake in the world
Sichuan Earthquake (2008)
On May 12, 2008, a major earthquake occurred in Sichuan Province, China.

According to the data from the China Earthquake Administration, the magnitude of the seismic waves of this earthquake reached 8.2, and the magnitude of the seismic intensity reached 8.3, and the area of destruction exceeded 100,000 square kilometers.

As of September 25, 2008, the earthquake caused 69,227 deaths, 17,923 missing persons, 374,643 injuries, 19.93 million homeless people, and a total population of 46.256 million people affected by the disaster.
It was the most destructive earthquake in the history of the People's Republic of China, and the most devastating earthquake since the Tangshan earthquake.

In March 2009, the State Council of China announced that May 12th would be designated as Disaster Prevention and Mitigation Day every year, and would strengthen the education of the public and attention to disaster prevention and mitigation work.
Since then, many governments and schools in China have held earthquake drills every year on this day.
Primary and secondary schools have also begun to attach importance to the popularization of "disaster reduction" education.
The 60-year-old strongest earthquake in the world
Haiti Earthquake (2010)
On January 12, 2010, a 7.0-magnitude earthquake occurred in the Caribbean Sea.
The epicenter is located 25 kilometers to the southwest of the capital city of Haiti, Port-au-Prince, and the hypocenter is about 13 kilometers below the surface.
The International Red Cross estimates that about 300,000 people have been affected by the earthquake.
The Haitian government has confirmed that more than 20,000 people have died.
In some parts of Haiti, as many as 90 percent of the homes were destroyed by the earthquake.
Despite a massive outpouring of aid and support from the international community, this failed state with a surplus of people and corruption has never recovered from this disaster.
The 60-year-old strongest earthquake in the world
Tohoku earthquake and tsunami (2011)
On March 11, 2011, a large-scale reverse fault earthquake with a magnitude of 9.0 occurred in the offshore waters of the northeastern Japan.

The epicenter of the earthquake is located in the Pacific Ocean to the east of Sendai, the capital city of Miyagi Prefecture, and the depth of the earthquake is estimated to be 2,400 meters, triggering a tsunami with a maximum height of 40.1 meters.
This earthquake is the first earthquake with a magnitude greater than 9 recorded in Japan's history.
About 22,000 people died in the disaster, and about 400,000 buildings were completely destroyed or collapsed.
The Fukushima No. 1 Nuclear Power Plant suffered a leak due to the earthquake and tsunami.
The accident was classified as the most serious level 7 on the international nuclear event scale (INES).
the Fukushima nuclear accident led to the measurement of microscopic amounts of radioactive materials throughout the world , including iodine @-@ 131 and cesium @-@ 137 ( half @-@ life , 30 years ) .
A large amount of radioactive isotopes were released into the Pacific Ocean after the nuclear accident.
According to the statistics of the United Nations, at least 870,000 people in the disaster areas of Afghanistan and Pakistan urgently need food.
In Syria alone, more than 5.3 million people have been displaced by earthquakes.
The World Food Programme (WFP) has appealed for $77 million to provide food to people affected by the earthquake in Turkey and Syria.
The temperature in the disaster area is currently below zero, and many victims have no place to live.
The Turkish government has distributed blankets, tents and hot meals, but they have still been difficult to reach many people in need.
In war-torn Syria, where the conflict has lasted for 12 years, the earthquake has made the people's suffering even worse.
The World Food Programme has already provided food aid to 115,000 people in Turkey and Syria in the four days since the earthquake.
The World Health Organization (WHO) sent 72 tons of medical supplies for the treatment of external injuries and emergency surgery.

Recently, the Traffic Police Department received several cases of telecommunications fraud. The fraudsters pretended to be Telstra, a telecommunications company in Australia, and sent fraudulent text messages to the victims with a link to a website, urging them to exchange their points for rewards as soon as possible, and then lured them to log into the fake website to exchange the rewards.

The victim followed the instructions to enter their credit card information and verification code, and then received a notice from the financial institution that their credit card had been used for unauthorized purchases, suspecting that their credit card information had been stolen from the above website.

Warning:
1. Pay more attention to the security information on the Internet, and improve personal prevention awareness;
2. Do not log into unknown websites and register your personal information and credit card information, to prevent theft;
3. Be cautious of fake websites and phishing websites, and pay attention to whether the website address is completely consistent with the official website;
4. Install antivirus software on your mobile device, tablet or computer and keep it updated;
5. If you suspect fraud or other crimes, please call the Anti-Fraud Hotline 8800 7777 or the Reporting Hotline 993 for assistance.

Xi Jinping’s letter of encouragement to the Chinese medical team in Africa: Practice benevolence and benevolent arts to benefit the local people, and tell the story of China with practical actions.

Xinhua News Agency, Beijing, February 10 (Reporter Liang Hui) On February 9, Xi Jinping, General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee, President of the People's Republic of China, and Chairman of the Central Military Commission, sent a letter to the members of the 19th Chinese medical team sent to assist the Central African Republic, and extended greetings and expressed his sincere hope to all the medical teams sent to assist

Xi Jinping said in his reply that you have overcome difficulties in work and life in Chad-Niger, and have served the local people with sincerity, and you are not only the white-clad angels who save lives and help the injured, but also the friendly envoys who convey feelings.

The market is worried that Alphabet won't be able to compete with Microsoft.

Bard mentioned that the first photo of a planet outside the solar system was taken by this telescope.
